ai-patthana22.36:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.36:0.3_0: for those who always pursue self-control and so on.
ai-patthana22.36:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana22.36:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.36:2.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of livelihood, etc., conditions give rise to causes and reasons. ...
ai-patthana22.36:3.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of non-existence, consciousness arises dependent on a refuge.
ai-patthana22.36:4.1_0: Not for the sake of livelihood and for the crossing of the flood.
ai-patthana22.36:4.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana22.36:6.1_0: Though he’s covered with a mixed woman, he should go in the same place as before.
ai-patthana22.36:7.1_0: Not for the sake of non-violence, or for the sake of refuge, nor for the sake of all sentient beings, for the sake of knowledge and conduct, for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of law.
ai-patthana22.36:8.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of refuge, nor for the sake of all sentient beings. ...
ai-patthana22.36:9.1_0: Not for the sake of livelihood and for the purpose of crossing the flood, nor for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of livelihood, and for the sake of purification,
ai-patthana22.36:10.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of non-result,
ai-patthana22.36:10.1_1: this is not the condition for the deathless, nor for the future, nor for the removal of thirst, nor for the sake of non-disappearance.
ai-patthana22.36:10.1_2: It is not a condition for the purpose of crossing the flood and not for the purpose of crossing the flood.
ai-patthana22.36:10.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana22.36:11.1_0: In the same way the sake of one lifetime all decisions of the three, three, four, five, ten. ...
ai-patthana22.36:11.1_1: After reappearing in the twenty-fourths, three drops drawn out from the three faculties, and one is observed in the three absorptions, the faculties of imperfects, and the physical faculties are not. ...
